name: Bus World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or newer (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 or Radeon R9 280 (no support for onboard cards)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or newer (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Turkish, Czech, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
